properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 10:13AM CST until January 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...

Big Muddy River near Murphysboro

.The Big Muddy River at Murphysboro Illinois will continue to fall this
week. It is forecast to go below flood stage next Monday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Big Muddy River near Murphysboro
* until Monday morning.
* At  9:30 AM Tuesday the stage was 25.5 feet.
* Flood Stage is 22.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall this week. It is
forecast to go below flood stage Monday morning.
* Impact...At 24.0 Feet...Some minor flooding in S 3rd & Division /
Plum Street area.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
